pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the Prime Minister of Spain, Pedro Sánchez | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez of Spain. 

The Prime Ministers discussed the international community’s response to the crisis in Venezuela and the illegitimate Maduro regime. Prime Minister Trudeau emphasized his support for Interim President Juan Guaidó. The Prime Ministers agreed on the imperative for new, free and fair elections in Venezuela and agreed to coordinate closely in response to the crisis. 

Prime Minister Trudeau thanked Prime Minister Sánchez for Spain’s statement of support for two Canadians who have been arbitrarily detained in China, and for Spain’s concern over the arbitrary imposition of the death penalty on a third Canadian. They emphasized the importance of adhering to the rule of law.
